issue.title: Rename Compile namespace to StaticAnalysis
issue.body: The `Compile` namespace was misnamed and doesn't carry a lot of meaning. What is really happening inside this namespace are those things primarily related to static analysis of a codebase. This namespace and the classes referencing `Compile` should be renamed to more appropriately represent what they're actually doing.

commits.message:
Task/rename compile namespace (#283)

* Rename Compile -> StaticAnalysis

* Rename tests Compile -> StaticAnalysis

* Rename tests Compile -> StaticAnalysis

* Convert AnnotatedTargetDefinitionConvert to concrete implementation

issue.title: Remove package private concept from source directories
issue.body:
Currently the annotated-container.xml file marks any directories it finds in autoload-dev with a packagePrivate=true attribute. While no functionality currently uses this value it was expected that later features would make use of this to selectively choose directories to skip in certain situations. Specifically, scanning the vendor/ directory for third-party libraries integrating with Annotated Container was expected to utilize this. However, the way vendor/ scanning was initially conceived has been changed. In addition, adding the concept of what packagePrivate=true actually means to the Bootstrap had many questions/challenges.

This attribute should simply be removed from the existing configuration.

commits.message:
Remove packagePrivate config attribute (#282)

* Remove packagePrivate config attribute

* Update version to be appropriate

issue.title: Remove package private concept from source directories
issue.body:
Currently the annotated-container.xml file marks any directories it finds in autoload-dev with a packagePrivate=true attribute. While no functionality currently uses this value it was expected that later features would make use of this to selectively choose directories to skip in certain situations. Specifically, scanning the vendor/ directory for third-party libraries integrating with Annotated Container was expected to utilize this. However, the way vendor/ scanning was initially conceived has been changed. In addition, adding the concept of what packagePrivate=true actually means to the Bootstrap had many questions/challenges.

This attribute should simply be removed from the existing configuration.

issue.title: Split Bootstrap\Observer into granular interfaces
issue.body: Currently the Bootstrap\Observer forces implementing 4 different methods, however it is common to only care about a subset of these, leaving multiple methods unimplemented for no apparent reason. Instead of encouraging this kind of design we should split up the Observer such that each method is its own interface.
